DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine ginger is effective in the prevention of abdominal distention in post Cesarean section patient.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Ginger in the Prevention of Abdominal Distention in Post Cesarean Section Patient
DOC.criteria: Post cesarean section women allergic to ginger time of cesarean section more than 1 hour perform another operation such as appendectomy, cystectomy former use carminative drugs already have abdominal distention
